requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2.4 GHz or equivalent (Apple Silicon or Intel Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
